ygData.subject: RE: Staff of Forbidden Rites

ygData.messageBody:
there I agree....but make it CLERIC only if you put res on it. I've got my
2h blunt at VERY good and same with 1h blunt....so I'm happy either way :)
(had a crook for a long while)

-----Original Message-----
From: Heather Daley [mailto:blushn@...]
Sent: Tuesday, September 21, 1999 9:26 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Staff of Forbidden Rites


From: "Heather Daley" <blushn@...>

I don't agree with the charges of res myself, however, this is a weapon I
would weild, 9wis 50mana 50hp, pretty damn good stats. So what the dly is
50, we aren't tanks anyway, But I would put down my mace and sheild for a
bit to practice 2Hblunt with this weapon.

Bree Wyndsdale
